umncvmstats

The umncvmstats package standardizes the function usage and the output for basic statistical functions to allow new R users to focus on learning the principles of statistics and statistical communication rather than on the details of R.

For installation instructions and a basic overview of using R, see the Getting Started article.

See additional articles for more details.
